name: Rajesh Ramsaroop
body:
# Rajesh Ramsaroop

Website (Portfolio & Blog): [Beware of Raj](http://www.bewareofraj.com)

E-mail: [raj@bewareofraj.com](mailto:raj@bewareofraj.com)

## Statement

Programmer with a degree in Information Technology, concentration in Software Development. Looking to leverage education and genuine passion for software development to deliver desktop, mobile and/or web based software solutions for your business and clients.

## Education

**B.S. Information Technology** (Concentration in Software Development) - Georgia Gwinnett College

## PROJECTS

### My TV Tracker, Android app
A work in progress, creating an app that tracks TV shows the user is watching and notifies them when a new episode or season starts. Retrieve and process JSON data from REST API calls, integrate fragments as part of a responsive layout, create layouts using XML, store information in SQLite database, maintain version control using git, track bugs and issues with Github.

[Github repository](https://github.com/hitraj47/my-tv-tracker)

### GGC Events, Windows 8 desktop app
Developed with a team of students this Windows 8 desktop app was created to notify students of events happening on campus. Written in C# using Visual Studio, practice scum/agile development methodologies by participating in stand up meetings and deliver code at end of sprints, document requirements and design application using UML diagrams, collaborate and communicate with team members to assist in debugging and development.

### Bit Day Live Wallpaper, Android app
A live wallpaper that changes background based on the time of day. Publish app to Google Play store, user rated 4.2/5 with over 2,000 installs, track issues, bugs and feature requests using Github Issues.

[Play Store URL](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bewareofraj.wallpaper.bitdaylivewallpaper&hl=en) / [Github Repository](https://github.com/hitraj47/bit-day-live-wallpaper)

### Beware of Raj, WordPress web site
My personal blog and portfolio web site. Create custom theme using HTML/CSS, develop WordPress custom post types using PHP, integrate jQuery image slider and customize using JavaScript.

[http://www.bewareofraj.com](http://www.bewareofraj.com)

## Skills

**Languages:** Java, PHP, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, SQL

**Software and Operating Systems:** Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, MySQL/SQLite, Apache, 
Eclipse IDE, Processing.org, Sublime Text, X-Code, WordPress, Magento, phpBB, Photoshop

**Technologies/Platforms:** Android, Git, LAMP servers

**Other Skills:** Object oriented programming, Agile software development (Scrum)

## Relevant Experience

**Digital Designer (Frontend Developer)** (GE Capital Retail Bank/Synchrony Bank) _March 2014 - August 2014_
* Update web pages using HTML and CSS to meet legal formatting requirements.
* Code HTML e-mail marketing campaigns.


**Desktop Support Intern** (Cornerstone Media Group) _September 2011 - May 2012_
* Debug issues with client web sites and provide and implement solutions using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and/or PHP.
* Develop WordPress or Magento (e-commerce) CMS based web sites for clients according to their requirements.
